start.title: Welcome to Homarr
start.subtitle: Let's get started with setting up your Homarr instance.
start.description: To get started, please select how you want to set up your Homarr instance.

import.title: Import data
import.subtitle: You can import data from an existing Homarr instance.

dropzone.title: Drag the zip file here or click to browse
dropzone.description: The uploaded zip will be processed and you'll be able to select what you want to import

boardSelection.title: Found {count} boards
boardSelection.description: Choose all boards with the size you want to import

summary.title: Import summary
summary.description: In the below summary you can see what will be imported

token.label: Token
token.description: Enter the shown import token from your previous homarr instance

error.title: Invalid token
error.message: The token you entered is invalid

user.title: Admin user
user.subtitle: Specify the credentials for your administrator user.

group.title: External group
group.subtitle: Specify the group that should be used for external users.

name.label: Group name
name.description: Name has to match admin group of external provider

finish.title: Finish setup
finish.subtitle: You are ready to go!
finish.description: You have successfully completed the setup process. You can now start using Homarr. Select your next action:

login.title: Log in to your account
login.subtitle: Welcome back! Please enter your credentials

invite.title: Join Homarr
invite.subtitle: Welcome to Homarr! Please create your account

init.title: New Homarr installation
init.subtitle: Please create the initial administrator user

openSearchInNewTab.label: Open search results in new tab

error.title: Login failed
error.message: Your login failed

forgotPassword.label: Forgotten your password?
forgotPassword.description: An administrator can use the following command to reset your password:

error.title: Account creation failed
error.message: Your account could not be created

success.message: First day of week changed successfully

error.message: Unable to remove image
Unable to update profile

delete.label: Delete user permanently
delete.description: Deletes this user including their preferences. Will not delete any boards. User will not be notified.
delete.confirm: Are you sure, that you want to delete the user {username} with his preferences?

homeBoard.label: Home board
homeBoard.description: Only boards accessible to the group can be selected

mobileBoard.label: Mobile board
mobileBoard.description: Only boards accessible to the group can be selected

admin.label: Administrator
admin.description: Members with this permission have full access to all features and settings

use-all.label: Use all apps
use-all.description: Allow members to add any apps to their boards

modify-all.label: Modify all apps
modify-all.description: Allow members to modify all apps

full-all.label: Full app access
full-all.description: Allow members to manage, use and delete any app

view-all.label: View all boards
view-all.description: Allow members to view all boards

modify-all.label: Modify all boards
modify-all.description: Allow members to modify all boards (Does not include access control and danger zone)

full-all.label: Full board access
full-all.description: Allow members to view, modify, and delete all boards (Including access control and danger zone)

use-all.label: Use all integrations
use-all.description: Allows members to add any integrations to their boards

interact-all.label: Interact with any integration
interact-all.description: Allow members to interact with any integration

full-all.label: Full integration access
full-all.description: Allow members to manage, use and interact with any integration

view-all.label: View all medias
view-all.description: Allow members to view all medias

full-all.label: Full media access
full-all.description: Allow members to manage and delete any media

create.label: Create search engines
create.description: Allow members to create search engines

modify-all.label: Modify all search engines
modify-all.description: Allow members to modify all search engines

full-all.label: Full search engine access
full-all.description: Allow members to manage and delete any search engine

memberNotice.mixed: Some members are from external providers and cannot be managed here
memberNotice.external: All members are from external providers and cannot be managed here

reservedNotice.message: This group is reserved for system use and restricts some actions. <checkoutDocs></checkoutDocs>

error.message: The group could not be created

transfer.description: Transfer ownership of this group to another user.

error.message: Unable to transfer ownership

removeMember.confirm: Are you sure you want to remove {user} from this group?

attemptSearchEngineCreation.description: Integration "{kind}" can be used with the search engines. Check this to automatically configure the search engine.

createApp.label: Create app
createApp.description: Create an app with the same name and icon as the integration. Leave the input field below empty to create the app with the integration URL.

wrongPath.message: The path is probably not correct

iconPicker.header: Type name or objects to filter for icons... Homarr will search through {countIcons} icons for you.

string.invalidEmail: This field must be a valid email

tooSmall.string: This field must be at least {minimum} characters long
tooSmall.number: This field must be greater than or equal to {minimum}

tooBig.string: This field must be at most {maximum} characters long
tooBig.number: This field must be less than or equal to {maximum}

custom.passwordRequirements: Password does not meet the requirements
custom.boardAlreadyExists: A board with this name already exists
custom.fileTooLarge: File is too large, maximum size is {maxSize}

remove.message: Are you sure you want to remove this dynamic section? Items will be moved at the same location in the parent section.

remove.title: Remove category
remove.message: Are you sure you want to remove the category {name}?

openAllInNewTabs.title: Open all in tabs
openAllInNewTabs.text: Some browsers may block the bulk-opening of tabs for security reasons. Homarr was unable to open all windows, because your browser blocked this action. Please allow "Open pop-up windows" and re-try.

remove.title: Remove item
remove.message: Are you sure you want to remove this item?

app.name: App
app.description: Embeds an app into the board.

notFound.label: No app
notFound.tooltip: You have no valid app selected

dnsHoleSummary.name: DNS Hole Summary
dnsHoleSummary.description: Displays the summary of your DNS Hole

error.internalServerError: Failed to fetch DNS Hole Summary
error.integrationsDisconnected: No data available, all integrations disconnected

dnsHoleSummary.domainsTooltip: Due to multiple integrations Homarr can't calculate the exact number of domains being blocked

dnsHoleControls.name: DNS Hole Controls
dnsHoleControls.description: Control PiHole or AdGuard from your dashboard

clock.name: Date and time
clock.description: Displays the current date and time.

customTitleToggle.label: Custom Title/City display
customTitleToggle.description: Show off a custom title or the name of the city/country on top of the clock.

timezone.label: Timezone
timezone.description: Choose the timezone following the IANA standard

dateFormat.label: Date Format
dateFormat.description: How the date should look like

customTimeFormat.label: Custom time format
customTimeFormat.description: Use ISO 8601 to format time (this will override other options)

customDateFormat.label: Custom date format
customDateFormat.description: Use ISO 8601 to format date (this will override other options)

minecraftServerStatus.name: Minecraft Server Status
minecraftServerStatus.description: Displays the status of a Minecraft server

notebook.name: Notebook
notebook.description: A simple notebook widget that supports markdown

showToolbar.label: Show the toolbar to help you write markdown

allowReadOnlyCheck.label: Allow check in read only mode

iframe.name: iFrame
iframe.description: Embed any content from the internet. Some websites may restrict access.

error.unsupportedProtocol: The URL provided is using an unsupported protocol. Please use one of ({supportedProtocols})
error.noBrowerSupport: Your Browser does not support iframes. Please update your browser.

smartHome-entityState.name: Entity State
smartHome-entityState.description: Display the state of an entity and toggle it optionally

smartHome-executeAutomation.name: Execute Automation
smartHome-executeAutomation.description: Trigger an automation with one click

calendar.name: Calendar
calendar.description: Display events from your integrations in a calendar view within a certain relative time period

weather.name: Weather
weather.description: Displays the current weather information of a set location.

forecastDayCount.label: Amount of forecast days
forecastDayCount.description: When the widget is not wide enough, less days are shown

dateFormat.label: Date Format
dateFormat.description: How the date should look like

openIndexerSiteInNewTab.label: Open indexer site in new tab

healthMonitoring.name: System Health Monitoring
healthMonitoring.description: Displays information showing the health and status of your system(s).

location.disabledTooltip: Please enter a city or postal code

integration.description: Click <here></here> to create a new integration

app.description: Click <here></here> to create a new app

video.name: Video Stream
video.description: Embed a video stream or video from a camera or a website

hasAutoPlay.label: Autoplay
hasAutoPlay.description: Autoplay only works when muted because of browser restrictions

error.forYoutubeUseIframe: For YouTube videos use the iframe option

mediaServer.name: Current media server streams
mediaServer.description: Show the current streams on your media servers

downloads.name: Download Client
downloads.description: Allows you to view and manage your Downloads from both Torrent and Usenet clients.

defaultSort.label: Column used for sorting by default

showCompletedUsenet.label: Show usenet entries marked as completed

showCompletedTorrent.label: Show torrent entries marked as completed

activeTorrentThreshold.label: Hide completed torrent under this threshold (in kiB/s)

delete.title: Delete Item
delete.modalTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this job?

mediaRequests-requestList.name: Media Requests List
mediaRequests-requestList.description: See a list of all media requests from your Overseerr or Jellyseerr instance

mediaTranscoding.name: Media transcoding
mediaTranscoding.description: Statistics, current queue and worker status of your media transcoding

rssFeed.name: RSS feeds
rssFeed.description: Monitor and display one or more generic RSS, ATOM or JSON feeds

releases.name: Releases
releases.description: Displays a list of the current version of the given repositories with the given version regex.

highlightWithin.label: Highlight Within
highlightWithin.description: Usage example: 1w (1 week), 10m (10 months). Accepted unit types h (hours), d (days), w (weeks), m (months), y (years)

duplicate.title: Duplicate board
duplicate.message: This will duplicate the board {name} with all its content. If widgets reference integrations, that you are not allowed to use, they will be removed.

error.title: Unable to duplicate board
error.message: The board could not be duplicated

error.title: Unable to apply changes
error.message: The board could not be saved

confirmLeave.title: Unsaved changes
confirmLeave.message: You have unsaved changes, are you sure you want to leave?

error.title: Import failed
error.message: The board could not be imported, check the logs for further details

avoidDuplicates.label: Avoid duplicates
avoidDuplicates.description: Ignores apps where an app with the same href already exists

onlyImportApps.label: Only import apps
onlyImportApps.description: Only adds the apps, the board need to be recreated manually

screenSize.label: Screen size
screenSize.description: In versions before 1.0 three different modes existed, so you were able to choose the amount of columns for each screen size.

sidebarBehavior.label: Sidebar behavior
sidebarBehavior.description: Sidebars were removed in 1.0, you can select what should happen with the items inside them.

lastSection.label: Last section
lastSection.description: Sidebar will be displayed below the last section

removeItems.label: Remove items
removeItems.description: Items contained in the sidebar will be removed

fixed.label: Fixed
fixed.description: Background stays in the same position.

repeat.label: Repeat
repeat.description: The image is repeated as much as needed to cover the whole background image painting area.

no-repeat.label: No repeat
no-repeat.description: The image is not repeated and may not fill the entire space.

repeat-x.label: Repeat X
repeat-x.description: Same as 'Repeat' but only on horizontal axis.

repeat-y.label: Repeat Y
repeat-y.description: Same as 'Repeat' but only on vertical axis.

cover.label: Cover
cover.description: Scales the image as small as possible to cover the entire window by cropping excessive space.

contain.label: Contain
contain.description: Scales the image as large as possible within its container without cropping or stretching the image.

customCss.label: Custom css for this board
customCss.description: Further, customize your dashboard using CSS, only recommended for experienced users

customClassesAlert.title: Custom classes
customClassesAlert.description: You can add custom classes to your board items in the advanced options of each item and use them in the custom CSS above.

disableStatus.label: Disable app status
disableStatus.description: Disables the status check for all apps on this board

itemRadius.label: Item radius
itemRadius.description: Changes the roundness of tiles on your board

isPublic.label: Public
isPublic.description: Public boards are accessible by everyone, even without an account.

general.title: General
general.unrecognizedLink: The provided link is not recognized and won't preview, it might still work.

rename.label: Rename board
rename.description: Changing the name will break any links to this board.

public.title: Make board private
public.description: Are you sure you want to make this board private? This will hide the board from the public. Links for guest users will break.

private.title: Make board public
private.description: Are you sure you want to make this board public? This will make the board accessible to everyone.

delete.label: Delete this board
delete.description: Once you delete a board, there is no going back. Please be certain.

confirm.title: Delete board
confirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete this board? This will permanently delete the board and all its content.

noBoard.title: Welcome to Homarr
noBoard.description: A sleek,  modern dashboard that puts all of your apps and services at your fingertips.
noBoard.notice: To make this page disappear, create a board and set it as the home board

notFound.title: Board not found
notFound.description: The board specified was either not found or you don't have access to it.
notFound.notice: Check the link or contact an administrator if you think it should be accessible

admin.description: You haven't set a home board for the server yet.
admin.notice: To make this page disappear for all users, set a home board for the server

user.description: You haven't set a home board yet.
user.notice: To make this page disappear, specify the home board in your preferences

anonymous.description: The server administrator hasn't set a home board yet.
anonymous.notice: To make this page disappear, ask the server administrator to set a home board for the server

breakpoint.label: Breakpoint
breakpoint.description: Layout will be used on all screens larger than this breakpoint until the next bigger breakpoint.

badge.label: Home
badge.tooltip: This board will show as your home board

badge.label: Mobile
badge.tooltip: This board will show as your mobile board

confirm.title: Delete board
confirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete the {name} board?

user.fieldsDisabledExternalProvider: Certain fields are disabled because they are managed by an external authentication provider.

groups.label: Groups
groups.title: Select all groups user should be member of
groups.description: The {everyoneGroup} group is assigned to all users and can not be removed.

new.title: New invite
new.description: After the expiration, an invite will no longer be valid and the recipient of the invite won't be able to create an account.

copy.title: Copy invite
copy.description: Your invitation has been generated. After this modal closes, you'll not be able to copy this link anymore. If you do no longer wish to invite said person, you can delete this invitation any time.

delete.title: Delete invite
delete.description: Are you sure, that you want to delete this invitation? Users with this link will no longer be able to create an account using that link.

general.title: General
general.ownerOfGroupDeleted: The owner of this group was deleted. It currently has no owner.

setting.title: Settings
setting.alert: Group settings are prioritized by the order of groups in the list. The top settings overwrite the bottom settings.

error.message: Failed to save settings

general.title: Send anonymous analytics
general.text: Homarr will send anonymized analytics using the open source software Umami. It never collects any personal information and is therefore fully GDPR & CCPA compliant. We encourage you to enable analytics because it helps our open source team to identify issues and prioritize our backlog.

widgetData.title: Widget data
widgetData.text: Send which widgets (and their quantity) you have configured. Does not include URLs, names or any other data.

integrationData.title: Integration data
integrationData.text: Send which integrations (and their quantity) you have configured. Does not include URLs, names or any other data.

usersData.title: Users data
usersData.text: Send the amount of users and whether you've activated SSO

crawlingAndIndexing.title: Crawling and Indexing
crawlingAndIndexing.warning: Enabling or disabling any settings here will severely impact how search engines will index & crawl your page. Any setting is a request and it is up to the crawler to apply these settings. Any modification may take up to multiple days or weeks to apply. Some settings may be search engine specific.

noIndex.title: No index
noIndex.text: Do not index the website on search engines and don't show it in any search results

noFollow.title: No follow
noFollow.text: Do not follow any links while indexing. Disabling this will lead to crawlers attempting to follow all links on Homarr.

noTranslate.title: No translate
noTranslate.text: When the site language is likely not that the user is likely to want to read, Google will show a translation link in the search results

noSiteLinksSearchBox.title: No site links search box
noSiteLinksSearchBox.text: Google will build a search box with the crawled links along with other direct links. Enabling this will ask Google to disable that box.

homeBoard.label: Global home board
homeBoard.description: Only public boards are available for selection

enableStatusByDefault.label: Enable status by default
enableStatusByDefault.description: When adding an app item, the status will be enabled by default

forceDisableStatus.label: Force disable status
forceDisableStatus.description: Status for apps will be disabled for all users and can't be enabled

defaultSearchEngine.label: Global default search engine
defaultSearchEngine.description: Integration search engines can not be selected here

createApiToken.title: API token created
createApiToken.description: API token was created. Be careful, this token is encrypted in the database and will never be transferred again to you. If you loose this token, you'll no longer be able to retrieve this specific token.

delete.title: Delete API token
delete.text: This will permanently delete the API token. API clients using this token can no longer authenticate and perform API requests. This action cannot be undone.

about.text: Homarr is a community driven open source project that is being maintained by volunteers. Thanks to these people, Homarr has been a growing project since 2021. Our team is working completely remote from many different countries on Homarr in their leisure time for no compensation.

libraries.subtitle: {count} used in the Code of Homarr
